altername_name: Simple Characters 2000 Series Vol. 02: Afroken: The Puzzle
name: Simple Character 2000 Series Vol. 02: Afro-ken: The Puzzle
overview: Simple Characters 2000 Series Vol.02 - Afro Ken - The Puzzle is a puzzle game based on the Afro Ken Characters. The game features unlockables picture & movies galleries, and these game modes: - 1 Player mode - 2 Players Vs mode
